channel.title: AI "pause" and some graphical bugs
channel.description:
A few bugs I've found on my latest playthrough.
For starters, I don't know [i]what [/i]I did to trigger this, but in Power Up, for a while, some of the Marines above the generator were ignoring me (getpos info is in the screenshots at the top-right, console was flooding with the flashlight message):
[img='https://i.imgur.com/4Z9mgdC.jpg',none,592][/img] [img='https://i.imgur.com/SfU495r.jpg',none,596][/img]
Some graphical things I've noticed, too.
I only got a still image, but this part of the metal walkway has some z-fighting going on. It looks to me like it's supposed to break, like it did in HL1, is that the case?
[img='https://i.imgur.com/E7fO8ZT.jpg',none,582][/img]
In OaR, I didn't get a getpos because I forgot (different session) and I only checked the first map, but the rotating elevator support just sort of... clips through the floor:
[img='https://i.imgur.com/2Q0QHnH.jpg',none,587][/img]
Had this happen at the end of Apprehension - one of the Marines is invisible, for some reason. 8| If it helps any, the only thing out of the ordinary I did that I can think of was tossing a grenade over the crates on the right side of the door after entering (the ones to the right of the visible Marine in the image).
[img='https://i.imgur.com/mfB6bZl.jpg',none,589][/img]
And then, something minor in Residue Processing - the fade distance on this spool model thingy is too close, and it's a physics prop, so players can carry it around to a place where the fade distance is more obvious:
[img='https://i.imgur.com/x9ER28n.jpg',none,587][/img] [img='https://i.imgur.com/F7rGYSc.jpg',none,583][/img] [img='https://i.imgur.com/KS2oPtm.jpg',none,585][/img] [img='https://i.imgur.com/b7m157c.jpg',none,583][/img]
